content: The Veradigm Payer and Life Sciences business had some nice wins in the quarter, driving the year-over-year revenue growth of 10%. Yes, we certainly -- I made the point on the second quarter call about how we really felt like with our capital foundation, cash on hand, the cash we're generating from the business that it was not going to be an either/or for us. So basically, your -- the sort of rates that you talked about, like 20% to 25% for maybe that business, maybe not on every quarter basis, but on an annual basis might still hold maybe 4%, or 3% to 4% for providers.
